Install package from GitHub:

```{r, eval = F}
devtools::install_github("favstats/peRspective")
```

```{r}
library(peRspective)

```


## Example

```{r}
key <- "xxx"

prsp_score("Hello whats going on? Please don't leave. I need to be free.", 
           key = key,
           score_model = peRspective::prsp_models)

```
